newsitem.title: USA: Loewen Group sets $350 mln in two-part debt.
newsitem.headline: Loewen Group sets $350 mln in two-part debt.

text.p: Loewen Group International Inc priced $350 million in guaranteed senior notes via a two-part 144A private placement debt offering, market sources said on Tuesday.
The five-year issue was priced to yield a spread of 137 basis points over U.S. Treasuries and the seven-year tranche priced to yield a spread of 175 basis points over Treasuries.
The notes are rated Ba1 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and BB-plus by Standard & Poor's. Smith Barney was lead underwriter on the deal, syndicate source said.
